Row.Text: Carnaval de Oruro

Our festive lands celebrate each year the colorful Carnaval de Oruro. Each year thousands of dancers and Comparsas Folklóricas dance through the streets of Oruro, towards the Virgen del Socavón. The UNESCO are deciding to declare it an Intangible Cultural Heritage.[NEWLINE]
Excellent, lets use this chance to improve our diplomacy!

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_NumMag} [ICON_RES_MAGISTRATE] Magistrates[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive a free Comparsa Folklórica unit [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive 2 free delegates
We have used the chance for getting more international influence through our Carnival!
Lets improve the quality and infraestructure of our Carnaval before
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive a free Great Engineer
We have decided to improve our infraestructure before our next Carnaval
Lets celebrate!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive a free Comparsa Folklórica!
We are celebrating our Carnaval now!
The Carnaval de Oruro has been declared "Intangible World Heritage" by the UNESCO
Oligarchic Uprising

"Tata" Belzu, your populist policies that favour the artisans are generating unrest within the oligarchy. Some of their Caudillos have decided to start a revolt against you. This will rise your popularity within the lower classes, allowing you to enact more policies[NEWLINE]
We'll not fall before our evil enemies!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Barbarian Units appear near your capital with a Great General[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive {1_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture!
The Oligarchy has started an uprising against you!
An uprising against Belzu has started within Bolivia
The Peruvian Diplomat

The coin we're using within our country has created a conflict with our neighbors. The "Moneda Feble" has entered their lands generating economical problems to them. A Diplomat sent by {1_Leader} has come with the mission of dealing with this, so to enhance their own economy[NEWLINE]
Change your coin
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose all your [ICON_GOLD] Gold Reserves[ENDCOLOR]
You have decided to listen to the will of your neighbors!
Expell the Diplomat
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Instantly declare war to {1_Leader}[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive {2_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture
You have decided to expel the foreign diplomat!
A Diplomat has been sent to a dangerous quest to Bolivia
